content: The "Autism CARES Act of 2014" designates an official to oversee national autism spectrum disorder research, services, and support activities in consultation with the Secretaries of Defense and Education. The official is responsible for implementing activities and ensuring alignment with the strategic plan developed by the Interagency Autism Coordinating Committee. The Autism CARES Act of 2014 aims to prevent duplication in autism spectrum disorder activities across federal departments.
